name: Where are my sexy red boots
name_original: Where are my sexy red boots
description:
For the Ludum Dare 48 "Deeper and Deeper", FroBros tackled the topics of resizing the environment, objects and the player Cameron.

Content:

After a peaceful night, Cameron's sexy red boots get stolen by Magic Man, whose thirst for attention led to a horrible curse. Maybe, Cameron can make the best of it.

Controls:

MoveWASD or ARROW KEYS
InteractSPACE
Shrink/enlargeMOUSE WHEEL
or PG-UP <-> PG-DOWN
or RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON

Thanks for trying. Leave a comment. We would love to read your feedback!
